basics.name: Allen Long
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science with a specialization in Cybersecurity in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

highlights: Welcome and serve guests with utmost respect
Manage public inquiries and guest relations

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
